item.description:
The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

June 12th we celebrate PRIDE with DJ JODI outside in our SPACIOUS PATIO that can accommodate over 500 beautiful women.

Come check us out as we decorate the PATIO with our PRIDE COLORSSSSSSSS

Every Saturday Night is Ladies Night: (10 min from Boston)

Come and enjoy a night of dancing and a chance to meet some very nice women.

DJ Jodi will be mixing her R&B, Latin and top 40 fabulous music all night long.

• ATM
• Hi-Def TV (Sports Channels)
• Premium Liquor
• BARBEQUE
• OUT DOOR POOL TABLES
• BEER PONG
• DARTS
• 2 Parking Lots (FREE)
• $7.00 Cover charge
• Hours 6:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m.
• 5 minute WALK from Malden T-Station
item.name: PRIDE PARTY @ THE HIDE AWAY
